title: Hay-Maker [Faneuse]
credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Barbara Hoffstot Jenkins in honor of Mr. and Mrs. Henry Phipps Hoffstot and Mr. Henry Phipps Hoffstot, Jr.
provenance_text:
Adolphe-William Bouguereau [1825-1905], until October 13, 1869. (Sold at Goupil Gallery, Paris, France, October 13, 1869, no. 4481) [1]; sold to Mr. Burns [2]; Frank Norton Hoffstot [-1938], Pittsburgh, PA and Long Island, NY, 1900? until 1938 [3]; by descent to Mr. and Mrs. Henry Phipps Hoffstot, Pittsburgh, PA, 1938 until 1967; Mrs. Henry Phipps Hoffstot [-1994], Pittsburgh, PA, until 1968 [4]; by descent to Barbara Hoffstot Jenkins [1919-1997], Warrenton, Virginia [5]; gift to Estate of Barbara Hoffstot Jenkins [1997-], 1997. Gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1997. 
NOTES: [1] 3000F, stockbook no. 4481 [2] see Catalogue Raisonne by Damien Bartoli and correspondence from Dick MacInstosh in curatorial file [3] See correspondence with Henry Hoffstot, Jr. in curatorial file [4] Barbara Drew Hoffstot [5] Mrs. Alan Nelson Jenkins
